modName: PC Head Tracking and Voice Type - Team Fortress 2 and Michael Rosen pack
summary: Always wanted to role play with your voiced character, but wanted some more comic stuff? Well I am here to make your dreams come true. A mod that was requested by many. How about Team Skyrim 2 with Michael Rosen pack? This mod of the main mod adds 9 class voice packs + 1 Mr. Rosen.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Always wanted to role play with your voiced character, but wanted some more comic stuff? Well I am here to make your dreams come true. A mod that was requested by many. How about Team Skyrim 2 with Michael Rosen pack? This mod of the main mod adds 9 class voice packs + 1 Mr. Rosen.

[b]Installation:[/b][/size]
[size=2]I'm sure you know where to put the folder, but in case: Skyrim\Data\sound\fx[/size]

[b][size=3]Greetings:[/size][/b]
[size=2]Functions like HELLO, GOODBYE and RANDOM work differently here. Just like in tf2, they are used as Positive, Negative and Taunt. I recommend you to bind keys to them. I was also trying to make them as lore-friendly as possible.[/size]

[size=2]Hello - Negative Response (tap the key when there is something you don't like e.g. boss fight, loot, corpses, room, events...)[/size]

[size=2]Goodbye - Positive Response (tap the key when there is something you like e.g. finished quest, cleared dungeon, loot, events...)[/size]

[size=2]Random - Taunt (tap the key when you are in a fight with an enemy, taunting them like they do you)
[/size]
[size=2]----------------------------------------------------------------------[/size]
[size=2]Don't forget to endorse the main mod author HHaleyy!Â [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72039/?]Main Mod here[/url][/size]
[size=2]----------------------------------------------------------------------
[/size]
[color=#ffff00][size=3]Notice for admins and staff: If you have any problem with this mod, don't delete it, but let me know first, so we can solve any possible misunderstandings.[/size][/color]

[size=4][color=#ff0000]Disclaimer:[/color][b] [u][color=#ff0000]!!!THE SOUNDS FROM TEAM FORTRESS 2 GAME IS VALVE'S PROPERTY! I DO NOT GET ANY PROFIT FROM IT! THE SOUND FILES ARE USED ONLY FOR PERSONAL NON-COMERCIAL USE! ANYONE THAT TRIES TO USE IT OTHERWISE, WILL BE PROSECUTED!!![/color][/u][/b][/size]
author: RickUnkinetic
